name: TV Aerial Simulator - GGJ 2019
description:
This VR game allows young people to experience home life of the 1970s. While one player watches television, the other player has to adjust a TV aerial to keep the signal strong.

This is a forked version of the entry to Global Game Jam 2019. 

View and download the game on the Global Game Jam website: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/tv-aerial-simulator

Instructions

Connect both your HTC Vive controllers to a TV aerial and then put on the headset. Get a close relative to move the TV aerial around to get a better signal.
